description.compact: Controller is the customized base controller class.

docblock.description: All controller classes for this application should extend from this base class.

var.description: the default layout for the controller view. Defaults to '//layouts/column1',

docblock.var: meaning using a single column layout. See 'protected/views/layouts/column1.php'.

var.description: context menu items. This property will be assigned to {@link CMenu::items}.
the breadcrumbs of the current page. The value of this property will

docblock.var: be assigned to . Please refer to for more details on how to specify this property.
